pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 / AMD FX-4350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD RX 580 with 6GB of VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
